text: WLUG-LP (106.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Anniston, Alabama. The station is owned by Center of Hope, Inc. It airs a contemporary Christian music format. The station was assigned the WLUG-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on July 31, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * LUG-LP LUG-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Alabama Category:Contemporary Christian radio stations in the United States Category:Calhoun County, Alabama LUG-LP
title: WLUG-LP
